adaptableLearningRates

Class AutoStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • adaptableLearningRates.LearningRates
      • adaptableLearningRates.AutoStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AutoStep
extends LearningRates
    Implementation of Mahmood's Autostep algorithm based on Sutton's linear IDBD. Until now, AutoStep is only defined for linear units.
    Author:
    Markus Thill
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • auto_update_v_alpha

        public double auto_update_v_alpha(int i,
                         double delta,
                         double x_i)
        Update the Parameter v_i and alpha_i in the AutoStep-Algorithm.
        Parameters:
        i - Index i.
        delta - Error-Signal of the TD-Algorithm.
        x_i - The input for weight i.
        Returns:
        The new value for alpha_i.
